comments: Transferred from Worcestershire to Herefordshire on 30.9.1897.

Created 29.9.1894 out of the parishes of Norton with Brockhampton 
    and Lower Brockhampton.
Transferred from Herefordshire to Worcestershire on 20.10.1844 and from Worcestershire back to Herefordshire on 30.9.1893.

Abolished 30.9.1895 and added to the parish of Pencombe with 
    Grendon Warren.
Abolished 29.9.1894 and added to the parish of Brockhampton.
Name changed to Moreton Jeffries between 1961 and 1965.
Created 29.9.1894 out of the parish of Norton with Brockhampton.

Abolished 29.9.1894 and divided between the parishes of Norton, 
    Brockhampton, Linton and Whitbourne.

Abolished 30.9.1895 and added to the parish of Pencombe with 
    Grendon Warren.

Created 30.9.1895 from the separate parishes of Pencombe and Grendon 
    Warren.
